text:
- RecoMed is an online
healthcare booking platform
and marketplace sort of like booking.com,
but for healthcare.

So we allow consumers
to look for a doctor,
a dentist, a physiotherapist,

or any other kind of healthcare
service and book it online

from their phone or from
their tablet or desktop, 24/7.

Our mission at RecoMed is
to improve of the access to
and delivery of healthcare,

to try to make the healthcare
system easier for consumers
to operate within.
RecoMed recently played a role

in the COVID 19 vaccination
effort in South Africa.

And to date, we have processed
over 600,000 vaccinations
of ordinary South Africans,
from those in the public sector,
to those in the private sector.
So this is exactly what we're trying to do
when we say our mission
is to improve delivery of healthcare.

- The AWS startup team
introduced us to RecoMed.
They had already adopted AWS
and they were leveraging traditional
AWS services like EC2 and RDS.
We came on board to assist them

in terms of the
Well-Architected Framework,
and evaluate their workloads

in terms of operational
excellence, security, reliability

performance efficiency,
and cost optimization.

And that involved a process
of running assessment

and then working with the
team to implement improvements
in reliability, security, compliance,

and evaluating where they
could save costs on AWS.

Since starting the journey
with RecoMed, two years ago,

they have scaled from 10 to
15,000 transactions a month,
to doing 10 times that today.

- We process over 150,000
bookings per month.

So we think we're getting
closer to achieving that vision.

So while we are scaling
a lot of computation,

we're also storing a high
volume of appointments

and we need to do that based
on the healthcare regulation.

So we're also utilizing a
lot of storage over time

and continually trying to
optimize this experience
for our users.
The AWS region big in Cape town
is very, very exciting for RecoMed,

and that is because most
enterprise organizations
do not want sensitive healthcare data
to leave the borders of the country.

So we are very excited when
AWS allowed us to host now
within the borders of the country.
And we're in the process
of moving our services and platform over.

- Silicon Overdrive works with
a lot of healthcare providers
and walking the journey with RecoMed
has been very exciting,

and we're looking forward
to helping their team
modernize their workloads on AWS,
ensuring they're secure,
and meeting their compliance requirements.
- RecoMed is in expansion mode.

We are currently launching
in Kenya in early 2022.

We are also in neighboring
South African countries
like Namibia, Botswana, Zimbabwe.
we're looking at broadly East Africa

and countries such as Ethiopia,
Rwanda, and Uganda as well.

So watch this space, I
think a year from today,

we should be very very active
in the rest of the continent
all out of our home base in South Africa.
(upbeat music)
